name: Wodiesan.github.io
body:
# A catalog of my time as a student

*"Specialization is for insects."*  
-Lazarus Long (as written by Robert Heinlen, *Time Enough for Love*)

In *Time Enough for Love*, Lazarus Long gives a [hefty list of requirements](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Competent_man) in order for a person to be considered a competent man. I've been unknowingly living my life trying to bring myself closer to something similar to the way Heinlen envisions his characters. Majoring in an engineering field (or electronic engineering tech, if you want specifics) allows me to bring myself a few steps closer towards that direction.

I'm [Ron Chau](http://www.linkedin.com/in/ronszechau/), and I do a little bit of everything. Some of the stuff I do outside of academics includes:

## Photographer

[![Wind and Thunder](https://sites.google.com/site/ronschau/_/rsrc/1392062921779/home/218618_10150229249652664_5220856_o.jpg?height=320&width=215)](https://www.flickr.com/photos/wodiesan/)  
Click the image for my catalog over at Flickr, where you'll find a mix of my personal and academic photography.  
* My personal interests includes landscape, product, travel, and wildlife photography.  
* My academic work includes photographing events and coursework-related projects.  
* As for my professional work, please e-mail me for details.

## Co-Founder

[![Modular Branch System](https://sites.google.com/site/ronschau/_/rsrc/1392063002521/home/ModularBranchSystemLogo.pdf-page-001.jpg?height=320&width=196)](http://modularbranch.com/)  
Through Wentworth's innovation and entrepreneurship program, [Accelerate](http://blogs.wit.edu/accelerate/), myself and three other students have begun a medical device start-up.

## Clinical Assistant

[![Ninja of 9S](https://sites.google.com/site/ronschau/_/rsrc/1392062740756/home/_ND84993.jpg?height=267&width=400)](http://www.pastudentessentials.com/caring-kids-answer-phone/)  
Check out my fellow colleague and PA student Derek Schmidt's write-up to get an idea of what I do at Boston Children's Hospital.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
